When developing or deploying OpenPGM programs, remember these steps.

=== Code ===
* Include the appropriate OpenPGM C header files; see [[OpenPGM C Reference/Include these Header Files|Include these Header Files]].
* Configure the PGM protocol; see [[OpenPGM C Reference/Set these Parameters|Set these Parameters]].


=== Compile ===
* Compile programs with a C compiler supporting ISO C99 plus GNU extensions.


=== Link ===
* Link with the appropriate OpenPGM C library files; see [[OpenPGM C Reference/Link these Library Files|Link these Library Files]].


=== Run ===
* Run with the appropriate system capabilities; see [[OpenPGM C Reference/Run with these Capabilities|Run with these Capabilities]].
